conbody.p: The source plugin project mdf-generation contains classes and resources related to code, document and model artifact generation from the domain models. The artifacts include Java Beans, Rules, OR Mappings, Service Configurations, Service Implementations, Service delegates, XML Schemas, XLS based documentation etc.
The source plugin project cdm-generation contains resources and classes that generate code and other artefacts related CDM specific components.
Click Code Generation for more details.
